TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在設計工具主機中，為 控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a designer host for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在設計工具主應用程式，當使用者從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，標記來源的程式碼，描述控制項衍生自抽象類別會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control that is derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當使用者切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項將保存到標記來源的程式碼中，並編輯網頁的標記。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 類別衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援在設計工具主應用程式。The class provides design-time support for controls that are derived from the in a designer host. 類別屬性會提供下列功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: - 屬性會傳回物件，其中通常包含物件衍生自繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級的設計工具中的類別。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 屬性設計工具的資料來源，提供存取其中一個定義。The property provides access to the designer of the data source, if one is defined. - 屬性會取得資料來源繫結至關聯控制項的預設檢視。The property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control. - 屬性會決定控制項是否應該轉譯其選擇及建立資料來源的預設動作清單。The property determines whether the control should render its default action lists for choosing and creating data sources. 類別方法提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法會執行連接至目前的資料來源所需的動作。The method performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source. - 方法會建立新的資料來源關聯的控制項。The method creates a new data source for the associated control. - 方法繫結相關聯的控制項是衍生自設計階段資料來源的類別。The method binds the associated control that is derived from the class to a design-time data source. - 方法會執行必要動作，若要從目前的資料來源中斷連線。The method performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source. - 方法取得可用在設計階段供關聯控制項的資料來源。The method gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. - 方法建構可在設計階段供關聯控制項的範例資料來源。The method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. - 方法來移除屬性或加入其他屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項衍生自的屬性類別。The method is used to remove properties from or add additional properties to or to shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 範例衍生`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl`類別從。The example derives the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class from the . `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl`類別是只要一份。The `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class is simply a copy of the . 此範例也是衍生`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner`類別從類別和地方物件`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner`上`MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl`類別。The example also derives the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` class from the class and places a object for the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` on the `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControl` class. `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner`會覆寫方法，讓屬性顯示在**屬性**在設計階段的方格。The `MyHierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 它會覆寫方法來產生標記的預留位置，設計階段標記是否`null`或，或空的設計階段標記是否``區塊 (亦即，如果沒有內部標記之間``It overrides the method to generate the markup for a placeholder if the design time markup is `null` or , or if the design-time markup is an empty `` block (that is, if there is no inner markup between the `` 和``標記)。and `` tags). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/CS/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/VB/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別建立關聯的控制項是衍生自時類別或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 取得此設計工具的行動清單集合。

span.span: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.

value.span: 與這個設計工具相關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會建立空物件。The property creates an empty object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ConnectToDataSource () As Boolean

summary.span: 執行必要的動作，以連接至目前的資料來源。

span.span: Performs the actions that are necessary to connect to the current data source.

returns.span: 如果執行連接至新的資料來源則為 ，如果新舊資料來源都相同則為 。

span.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed; if the old and new data source are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中斷和事件從先前的資料來源，然後將這些事件附加至新的資料來源。The method disconnects the and events from the previous data source, and then attaches these events to the new data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 為關聯的控制項建立新的資料來源。

span.span: Creates a new data source for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會顯示一個對話方塊，可用來建立資料來源關聯的控制項是衍生自類別。The method displays a dialog box that can be used to create a data source for the associated control that is derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要繫結至設計階段資料來源的 。

span.span: The to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 將關聯控制項繫結至設計階段資料來源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的第一個集屬性控制項的設計階段資料來源並將設定參考屬性設`null`。The method first sets the property of the control to reference the design-time data source and sets the property to `null`. 回呼衍生自控制項的方法繫結至設計階段資料來源的類別。The calls back to the method of the control that is derived from the class to bind to the design-time data source. 最後，它會還原原始值和屬性。Finally, it restores the original values of the and properties. `dataBoundControl`參數是衍生自控制項與這個設計工具或該控制項的複本相關聯的類別。The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is derived from the class that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DataSourceDesigner As IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 在選取資料來源進行資料繫結時，提供對資料來源設計工具的存取。

span.span: Provides access to the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.

value.span: 衍生自 之關聯控制項的資料來源設計工具，會實作 。

span.span: The designer for the data source of the associated control derived from the , which implements the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用來存取資料來源設計工具的屬性或相關聯控制項衍生自屬性類別。The data source can be accessed using the property of the designer or the property of the associated control that is derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DesignerView As DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView

summary.span: 取得繫結至關聯控制項的資料來源之預設檢視。

span.span: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
The representing the default view of the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用來存取資料來源設計工具的屬性或相關聯控制項衍生自屬性類別。The data source can be accessed using the property of the designer or the property of the associated control that is derived from the class.

summary.span: 執行必要的動作，以中斷與目前資料來源的連接。

span.span: Performs the actions that are necessary to disconnect from the current data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中斷和從目前的資料來源的事件。The method disconnects the and events from the current data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetDesignTimeDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetDesignTimeDataSource () As IHierarchicalEnumerable
abstract member GetDesignTimeDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable override this.GetDesignTimeDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable

summary.span: 取得可在設計階段供關聯控制項使用的資料來源。

span.span: Gets a data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 實作 介面的物件，可用來做為衍生自 之控制項的資料來源。

span.span: An object implementing the interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基於效能考量，最好是使用簡單的預先定義的資料來源在設計階段，而不是實際的資料來源控制項衍生自類別。For performance reasons, it is better to use a simple predefined data source at design time rather than the actual data source for the control that is derived from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetSampleDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetSampleDataSource () As IHierarchicalEnumerable
abstract member GetSampleDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable override this.GetSampleDataSource : unit -> System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable

summary.span: 建構可在設計階段用於相關聯控制項的範例資料來源。

span.span: Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 實作 介面的物件，這個介面可用作衍生自 之控制項的資料來源。

span.span: An object implementing the interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 範例資料來建構方法包含一個具有空的路徑的單一節點。The sample data constructed by the method has a single node with an empty path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，實作已加入和已遮蔽屬性的 。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除屬性或新增屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自陰影對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，使用的各種控制項屬性，以將屬性新增至或從其中移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 控制項是衍生自類別，方法會建立設計階段屬性，以遮蔽和屬性。For controls that are derived from the class, the method creates design-time properties to shadow the and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別，以變更**屬性**方格控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of the control at design time. 範例會使屬性顯示在**屬性**方格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/CS/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner/VB/hierarchicaldatabounddesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性新增至或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change the attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示控制項是否應該呈現其預設動作清單，其中包含資料來源 ID 下拉式清單和相關的工作。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should render its default action lists, which contain a data source ID drop-down list and related tasks.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設動作列出類別包含**選擇資料來源**功能表項目具有下拉式清單，從中可選取的資料來源，以及任何其他動作項目上的動作清單的資料來源控制項。The default action lists for the class include a **Choose Data Source** menu item that has a drop-down list from which a data source can be selected, and any other action items on the action lists of the data source control. 一般而言，資料來源控制項的動作清單將包含**設定資料來源**並**重新整理結構描述**功能表項目，雖然這些需要不一定會出現。Typically, the data source control action lists will include **Configure Data Source** and **Refresh Schema** menu items, although these need not always be present. **設定資料來源**功能表項目顯示的對話方塊，適用於資料來源所選的類型。The **Configure Data Source** menu item displays a dialog box that is appropriate to the type of data source chosen. 例如，如果資料來源控制項中，**設定資料來源** 對話方塊可讓您選擇的商務物件。For example, if the data source is an control, the **Configure Data Source** dialog box allows you to choose a business object for the . **重新整理結構描述**功能表項目會重新整理資料來源所套用的設計工具結構描述。The **Refresh Schema** menu item refreshes the designer schema that is applied by the data source.

para.span: 如果不想使用預設資料來源的動作清單項目要顯示，覆寫屬性，以傳回。

span.span: If you do not want the default data source action list items to be displayed, override the property to return .

para.span: 如果您想要其他資料來源的動作清單項目要顯示，覆寫返回，並覆寫新增適當的屬性物件新增至它所傳回的物件。

span.span: If you want other data source action list items to be displayed, override the to return and override the property to add the appropriate objects to the object that it returns.
